name: MultiValueMap_removeMappingTest
description: Unit tests for the removeMapping method in the MultiValueMap class.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMapping_KeyExistsAndValueExists
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method when the key exists and the value exists in the map.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMapping_KeyExistsAndValueDoesNotExist
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method when the key exists but the value does not exist in the map.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMapping_KeyDoesNotExist
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method when the key does not exist in the map.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMapping_KeyExistsAndCollectionBecomesEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method when the key exists and the collection becomes empty after removal.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMapping_MultipleValuesAndCollectionRemainsNonEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method when multiple values exist and the collection remains non-empty after removal.

test_cases.name: testRemoveMapping_MultipleKeysAndValues
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method when multiple keys and values exist in the map.
